title: Endangered Species
description: How much do you know about the world's most threatened animals and the efforts to save them?

questions.question: Which organization maintains the 'Red List' of threatened species?
The giant panda was reclassified from 'Endangered' to what status in 2016?
Which rhinoceros species has been declared functionally extinct in the wild with only two females remaining?
The vaquita, the world's most endangered marine mammal, is found only in which body of water?
What is the primary threat to orangutans in Borneo and Sumatra?
options: Habitat loss from palm oil plantations

questions.question: The California condor was brought back from the brink of extinction. How many were left in 1987?
Which sea turtle species is critically endangered and known for its beautiful shell?
The Amur leopard, one of the rarest big cats, is native to which region?
What is the biggest threat to elephant populations worldwide?
The kakapo, a critically endangered flightless parrot, is native to which country?
Which whale species was hunted nearly to extinction and remains endangered despite a whaling ban?
The pangolin holds what unfortunate distinction?
options: Most trafficked animal in the world

questions.question: What conservation program breeds endangered species in captivity for release into the wild?
The mountain gorilla population has increased thanks to conservation efforts in which African region?
Which famous flightless bird went extinct in the 17th century, becoming a symbol of extinction?
